summary: Craig Stueber is a senior front-end engineer and applied AI systems practitioner focused on AI behavior, safety, and reliability in production environments. His work spans prompt architecture, agentic systems, behavioral evaluation, and enterprise-grade software engineering.

promptEngineering.experience: Designs and deploys production-grade prompt architectures for real-world systems, not one-off demos.
knowledge: System prompts, developer prompts, and user prompt layering
Meta-prompts for self-checking and constraint enforcement
Determinism tuning and temperature control strategies
Failure-aware prompt patterns to reduce hallucination and overconfidence

behavioralEvaluation.experience: Actively evaluates model behavior under realistic usage conditions rather than benchmark-only testing.
knowledge: Hallucination rate measurement across repeated runs
methods: Scenario-based evaluation instead of static prompts

aiSafetyAndAlignment.experience: Applies AI safety principles at the system and UX level, not just model selection.
knowledge: Constrained generation and safe completion patterns
Ethical UX analysis for AI-assisted interfaces
Risk quantification using hybrid OWASP, CVSS, and behavioral metrics

failureModeAnalysis.experience: Identifies and mitigates failure modes observed in real production systems.
knowledge: Misalignment between system intent and model output
Prompt brittleness under minor input variation

modelDebuggingAndIncidentResponse.experience: Treats AI failures as operational incidents requiring diagnosis, reproduction, and correction.
knowledge: Separating model-layer issues from prompt-layer issues
Implementing corrective prompt and agent strategies
Leading behavioral incident response and postmortems

agenticFrameworksAndTooling.experience: Builds and evaluates agent-based systems with explicit control, observability, and failure boundaries.

knowledge: Integration with external systems and APIs
Tracing and observability of agent runs

openAIAndTracing.experience: Uses OpenAI APIs in production contexts with an emphasis on traceability and evaluation.
knowledge: OpenAI SDK usage for chat and responses APIs

css.knowledge: Flexbox, Grid, responsive layouts, maintainable design systems

javascript.knowledge: Enterprise dashboards, complex UI systems, event-driven architectures

typescript.knowledge: Type-safe React and Next.js applications at scale

python.knowledge: Evaluation tooling, automation, AI experimentation, backend scripting

php.knowledge: WordPress, backend services, legacy system integration

java.knowledge: Enterprise backend development in regulated environments

frameworksAndLibraries.experience: Used across production and internal platforms.

dataAndBackend.experience: Designs and integrates data layers for both web and mobile systems.

stateManagement.experience: Selects state tools based on complexity and risk.

testingAndQuality.experience: Strong emphasis on reliability and regression prevention.

accessibilityAndUX.experience: Accessibility treated as a core engineering requirement.

knowledge: App Store and Google Play publishing

iotAndMonitoring.experience: Builds monitoring pipelines for physical systems.

llmEvaluationFrameworks.experience: Designs custom evaluation harnesses for testing LLM behavior beyond accuracy metrics.

retrievalAugmentedGeneration.experience: Designs RAG systems to reduce hallucination and improve factual grounding.
knowledge: Failure modes in retrieval (stale data, over-recall)
Separation of retrieval and reasoning responsibilities

vectorSearchAndEmbeddings.experience: Uses vector embeddings to support retrieval and similarity-based workflows.

guardrailsAndOutputControl.experience: Implements guardrails to constrain LLM output and reduce unsafe or unreliable responses.

llmObservabilityAndTelemetry.experience: Treats LLM systems as observable production services.

modelAbstractionAndRouting.experience: Designs systems that support multiple LLM providers and models.
